Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: [INSERT FULL DETAILS FROM ABOVE] - Scaffolding: [INSERT FULL LAYERS FROM ABOVE] Generate 50 high-quality flashcards optimized for Anki/Quizlet, spanning all Bloom's levels and scaffolding layers (aim for even distribution: 20% per layer). Follow this exact schema for each card in JSON array format: { 'card_id': 1, 'front': 'Question text...', 'back': { 'answer': '**Correct answer.**', 'explanation': 'Full explanation...', 'distractors': ['D1 (why wrong)', 'D2 (why wrong)', 'D3 (why wrong)'] }, 'metadata': { 'bloom_level': 'Apply', 'scaffolding_layer': 'Layer 3', 'difficulty': 'Medium', 'topic_hierarchy': 'Full hierarchy string', 'references': ['kubernetes.io/...', 'aws.github.io/...'] } } Adhere strictly to the flashcard schema: Varied question types, distractor protocol (3 plausible, explained misconceptions), and comprehensive explanations linking to objectives, activities, and research. Ensure content is accurate, unbiased, and promotes active recall. Output only the JSON array of 50 cards.
